description:
As the Dark Rebel Armies scheme to conquer the world with the immense power of the Four Divine Kings, they have another plan in mind: resurrect the god of destruction Anthrasax. Amidst all this, Ninja Master Gara of the Four Divine Kings attacks the kingdom in order to find out Dark Schneider`s reason for siding with them, and kidnaps Yoko, who holds the key to freeing Anthrasax.
Source: Official Website
